1.title: Intro

episode of.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Watch as the Sandman draws a birthday cake, Bonnie bear visits the beach, and so much more.

2.title: Rainbow

episode of.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Bonnie Bear visits a city; Sandman reveals a drawing of a guitar; and a kite is revealed in Connect the Dots.

3.title: Basics

episode of.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Watch as a zoo is created out of clay; Bonnie Bear attends a music class and so much more.

4.title: Primaries

episode of.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Watch as a slide comes to life in Connect the Dots; The Sandman reveals a drawing of a footbal; and so much more.

5.title: Beauty of Art

episode of.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Bonnie Bear visits a yard, The Sandman reveals a drawing of an orange tree and a playground is built with clay.

6.title: Art Appreciation

episode of.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Listen to a story about a lost balloon, watch as an apple is revealed in Connect the Dots, and so much more.

imdb.title: Color Inspirations: Art and Music
akas: Color Inspirations: Art and Music (United States)
plot: Go on a magical journey of color, art and music featuring some of the hit shows from BabyFirst made just for babies and toddlers.
